# Spec Authoring Skill

## Overview

This skill focuses on writing clear, comprehensive specifications and requirements documents.

## Key Capabilities

- Gathering and documenting requirements
- Writing user stories and acceptance criteria
- Creating functional and non-functional requirements
- Defining success metrics and validation criteria

## Best Practices

- Use clear, unambiguous language
- Include specific, measurable criteria
- Consider edge cases and error scenarios
- Validate requirements with stakeholders
